name: Turbo Turnip
description:
Turbo Turnip is a quick and fun endless runner, where you play as a turnip, collecting vegetables, sliding under fences and jumping over pitchforks. It's your goal to collect as much veg as possible! 

This game was created in around 5/6 hours with myself doing programming, Viktoria "Nethi" Nestorova doing the art and Chris Delaney creating the audio. Basically, we didn't want to go to a guest lecture so we made a game instead, as you do.

Let us know what you think! And stay tuned as we'll be adding more content, such as high score tracking, in the near future!

v0.1.1 Patch Notes:
- UI no longer stops working after 2nd death
